vis¶

The visualization class provides a number of ways to easily visualize simulation results.

Used to quickly visualize results from the sim module, should not be used for production quality plots

rcfdtd_sim.vis.timeseries(sim, i, fname=None, interval=10, iscale=1, escale=1, hscale=1, iunit='NA', eunit='NA', hunit='NA')[source]¶

Animates the E and H-fields in time.

Parameters:
  • sim – The simulation to visualize
  • interval – The interval between timesteps in milliseconds
  • fname – The filename to export to, does not export if blank
  • iscale – The scalar factor that the x-axis is scaled by
  • escale – The scalar factor that the y-axis of the E-field is scaled by
  • hscale – The scalar factor that the y-axis of the H-field is scaled by
  • iunit – The units given to the x-label
  • eunit – The units given to the y-label for the E-field axis
  • hunit – The units given to the y-label for the H-field axis
